title: The Black Hood Strikes
brief_description: Winner in the Middle Animation category. Priceless jewels were stolen from a rich family during their fancy ball. It’s the BLACK HOOD!’ Only the local private investigator can get to the bottom of this terrible crime and find the Black Hood before he flees the country and it’s too late. Will he stop him, will he survive, will he run out of fuel and who is the BLACK HOOD? So many questions, it’s a mystery.
